content.raw:
I just quickly eye-balled some values and it at least looks better now ;) But you might want to load it in solidworks or so to estimate proper values
 
<inertial>
<pose>0 0 0.2 0 0 0</pose>
<inertia>
          <ixx>0.0083</ixx>
          <ixy>0</ixy>
          <ixz>0</ixz>
          <iyy>0.0025</iyy>
          <iyz>0</iyz>
          <izz>0.0097</izz>
        </inertia>
        <mass>1.5</mass>
      </inertial>
content.html:
I just quickly eye-balled some values and it at least looks better now ;) But you might want to load it in solidworks or so to estimate proper values

<inertial> <pose>0 0 0.2 0 0 0</pose> <inertia> <ixx>0.0083</ixx> <ixy>0</ixy> <ixz>0</ixz> <iyy>0.0025</iyy> <iyz>0</iyz> <izz>0.0097</izz> </inertia> <mass>1.5</mass> </inertial>
